arts.ttl: Kleindienst scores again as Gladbach beats St. Pauli 2-0 in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Alassane Plea got the home team off to a promising start in the 13th minute when he struck Marvin Friedrich’s header from a corner past Nikola Vasilj in the St. Pauli goal. Kleindienst made his Germany debut last month in a 2-1 win over Bosnia-Herzegovina.

In the 44th minute, Tim Kleindienst showcased his clinical finishing, delicately chipping the ball over Pauli goalkeeper Nikola Vasilj to double the Foals' lead. Borussia Mönchengladbach secured their fourth straight home victory with a 2-0 win against St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Borussia Monchengladbach vs. St Pauli
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Borussia Monchengladbach vs. St Pauli.

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs St. Pauli preview: Hosts look to continue home run
arts.sum: In a clash that could have significant implications for both the relegation battle and the push for European qualification, Borussia Monchengladbach will host St. Pauli at Borussia-Park on Sunday in their 11th Bundesliga fixture of the season.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Monchengladbach vs. St Pauli - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and St Pauli, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
